<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.OnCallFilters</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Reference qualifiers for On-Call Rota/Roster lookup </description>
        <name>OnCallFilters</name>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.include("PrototypeServer");

var OnCallFilters=Class.create();

OnCallFilters.prototype = {

   initialize : function() {
      this.debug = 'false';
   },

   setDebug: function(value) {
      this.debug = value;
   },

   // Roster lookup from Roster Schedule Entry form
   getRosterByGroup : function() {
      if (!current.group.nil()) 
         answer = "rota.group=" + current.group;
      return answer;
   },

   type: 'OnCallFilters'
};
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>james.grinter</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2010-11-10 15:09:53</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>365414430a0a2c961e4b3515c04c1b40</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>OnCallFilters</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="On-Call Scheduling" source="com.snc.on_call_rotation">37d4c9836de620100acb70b3534330d3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_365414430a0a2c961e4b3515c04c1b40</sys_update_name>
